oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville on the Cumberland River, circa 1970
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard of the Nashville city skyline taken from the Jefferson Street Bridge looking south, down the Cumberland River. The Railroad Bridge is visible, as is the Victory Memorial Bridge, just behind it. Other discernable landmarks include the Nashville Municipal Auditorium, the Tennessee State Capitol, and the Metropolitan Courthouse. Forms part of the Norton Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee State Capitol (Nashville, Tenn.); Nashville Municipal Auditorium (Tenn.); Metropolitan Courthouse (Nashville, Tenn.)
